paper_abstract: This letter presents a reduced-complexity algorithm for coordinated beamforming aimed at solving the multicell down-link max-min signal-to-interference-plus-noise problem under per-base-station power constraints. It is shown that the proposed algorithm can achieve close performance to the optimum algorithm with faster convergence and lower complexity.
paper_title: Reduced-Complexity Coordinated Beamforming for Multicell Downlink Max-Min SINR Problem
